reviewText: BEACHHEAD ANZIO - Watch the valiant efforts of the Allied Forces establishing a vital beachhead at the coastal town of Anzio, Itally. BATTLE FOR SAN PIETRO - Narrated by John Huston. Learn about one of the most dramatic and crucial battles of World War II.  BRIDGE AT REMAGEN PARTS 1 & 2 - Watch the events surrounding the capture of the bridge at Remagen by American troops March 7th, 1945. This gave the US troops the first bridgehead on the Rhine river. Included in this film is a review of the importance of this capture as part of the war in Europe.
